 <math alttext="q" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>q</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="A l" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Al</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>
 20.0
 84
 <math alttext="negative 5.9" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mo>−</mo> <mn>57</mn> </mrow> </mstyle> </math>

<math alttext="H 2 O" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>O</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>
 40.0

 <math alttext="question mark" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>?</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

For an experiment, a <math alttext="20.0 gram" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>20.0</mn><mtext> </mtext><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>g</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> piece of <math alttext="A l" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mtext>Al</mtext></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> was placed inside an insulated cup filled with <math alttext="40.0 grams" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>40.0</mn><mtext> </mtext><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>g</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> of <math alttext="H 2 O" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>O</mtext></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>. The data are given in the table above. Assuming no heat is absorbed by the container or the surroundings, which of the following equations provides the correct mathematical relationship for the transfer of heat <math alttext="q" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>q</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> between <math alttext="A l" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mtext>Al</mtext></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="H 2 O" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>O</mtext></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="negative q sub A l equals, 12 times q sub H 2 O" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mrow> <mo>−</mo> <msub> <mrow> <mi>q</mi> </mrow> <mrow> <mtext>Al</mtext> </mrow> </msub> <mo>=</mo> <mn>10</mn> <mo>×</mo> <msub> <mrow> <mi>q</mi> </mrow> <mrow> <msub> <mrow> <mtext>H</mtext> </mrow> <mrow> <mn>2</mn> </mrow> </msub> <mtext>O</mtext> </mrow> </msub> </mrow> </mrow> </mstyle> </math>

<math alttext="negative q sub A l equals, 6 times q sub H 2 O" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mrow> <mo>−</mo> <msub> <mrow> <mi>q</mi> </mrow> <mrow> <mtext>Al</mtext> </mrow> </msub> <mo>=</mo> <mn>5</mn> <mo>×</mo> <msub> <mrow> <mi>q</mi> </mrow> <mrow> <msub> <mrow> <mtext>H</mtext> </mrow> <mrow> <mn>2</mn> </mrow> </msub> <mtext>O</mtext> </mrow> </msub> </mrow> </mrow> </mstyle> </math>

<math alttext="negative q sub A l equals, 2 times q sub H 2 O" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mi>q</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>Al</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><msub><mrow><mi>q</mi></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>O</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="negative q sub A l equals, q sub H 2 O" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mi>q</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>Al</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow><mi>q</mi></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>O</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="negative q sub A l equals, q sub H 2 O" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mi>q</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>Al</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow><mi>q</mi></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>O</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.D: Make observations or collect data from representations of laboratory setups or results, while attending to precision where appropriate.
